about_the_game:
In the deepest and darkest place on Earth no one can hear your scream.

Dive into the dark world of Escape L.T.D. , where you play as a prisoner in a military base under the ocean. You cannot remember what brought you to this situation, but you are sure of one thing - you must not tarry, because the clock is ticking. There are no answers - only questions: where did such destruction come from? Why are there no other survivors? And what kind of research has been done here?



Game Features

  • Classic linear adventure game
  • Stylish and detailed visuals
  • Many different puzzles - both environmental and mini-games
  • Death is always near - the slightest mistake, and you're dead. Be aware of your surroundings
  • The base is almost completely absorbed by the ocean. Find out the secret of your past and manage to escape before it's too late.
  • Water is not your worst enemy. Darkness hides more than you can imagine.

content_descriptors.notes: The game features depictions of extreme violence and blood and gore (including mutilation and suicide) and imagery that some players may find disturbing.
